title: 111_s2071
content: CERTAIN IMAGING COLORANTS are added to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under a new heading in Subchapter II of chapter 99. Certain imaging colorants, including aryl substituted pyrazonyl and substituted naphthalene, are added to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under a new heading in Subchapter II of chapter 99. Certain imaging colorants, such as alkoxyphenyl azo and copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, are included in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under specific subheadings. Certain imaging colorants, including copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and sulphonoamides, sodium salts, are listed in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under specific subheadings. Certain imaging colorants, such as substituted copper phthalocyanine, are listed in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under specific subheadings. These include sodium salt, alkoxyl phenyl azo, carboxyphenylene, and lithium salt. Substituted phthalocyanine with sulphonic acids and sulphonoamides, sodium salts (CAS No. 90295-11-7) and substituted napthtylene with [[aminoalkyl triazinediyl]bis substituted phenylene azo]bis, sodium salt (CAS No. 50925-42-3) under specific subheadings in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Substituted napthtylene with sodium salt (CAS No. 50925-42-3) under subheading 3215.19.00 and chloro substituted sodium salt (PMN No. P-90-394) under subheading 3215.11.00. Amino triazinyl amino benzoic acid, sodium/lithium salts (PMN No. P-83-386) and aryl substituted phenylazo pyridine, sodium/lithium salt (PMN No. P-02-234) under subheading 3215.19.00 are listed under tariff heading 9902.01.00 with no changes before 12/31/2011. The effective date for the amendment mentioned in subsection (a) is the 15th day after the enactment of this Act, applying to articles entered or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption.
